ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed only He is the All Hearing, the All Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, He, only He, is the All-Hearer, the All-Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely He is the All-hearing, the All-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! He, only He, is the Hearer, the Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He is the All Hearing, the All Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily He! He is the Hearer, the Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed He is the All-hearing, the All-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For it is He Who heareth and knoweth all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! He, only He, is the All-Hearer, the All-Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Surely, He is the Hearer, the Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He is indeed the Hearer, the Aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:220] Truly He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 424 (Lo! He, only He, is the Hearer) of what they say, (the Knower) of them and of their works.
